body.text: Bot are supposed to make work easier. In reality, text-only chat bots can be cumbersome and tedious to work with, especially when interactions get more complex. Users may need to remember complicated commands or respond to a series of questions in order to complete a task.

Cards are essentially GUIs, which are much more intuitive and easier for users to follow. As you can see in the example above, the card uses a simple form to collect information instead of a more complex text-based interaction.
If you have previously built Webex bots or integrations, consider how the user experience of those apps can be optimized by using Buttons and Cards.
